column4: I am trying to use rdesktop to connect to a local server, I have xrdp installed on the server, but when I try to log in I get "connecting to 127.0.0.1 5910" "error - problem connecting" :(    this looks like a VNC port number.  what is wrong?
what do you mean?   I am using the command "rdesktop <host>" on the remote.
